food.question: I am yellow and yummy. Monkeys like to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am a fruit.
🤸 You can peel me before you eat me.
🐒 Monkeys love to eat me!

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You drink me with your breakfast. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am a liquid.
🐄 Cows make me.
🥣 You can pour me on cereal.

food.question: I am round and red or green. You can bite into me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on trees.
🍎 Snow White liked me a lot!
🦷 I am a healthy snack.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a vegetable.
🐰 Rabbits love to eat me!
👁️ People say I'm good for your eyes.

food.question: I am small and round. I can be green, red or purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in bunches.
🧺 You can pick me off a vine.
🍷 You can make juice out of me.

food.question: I am long and green. You can eat me in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 I am a vegetable.
🥒 I am cool and refreshing.
🥪 You might find me on a sandwich.

food.question: I am sweet and juicy. I have a big seed inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🍑 I am a fruit.
🌳 I grow on trees in the summer.
🥄 You have to eat around the seed.

food.question: I am made from flour and baked in an oven. You can put butter on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am a type of bread.
🔥 I need to be cooked before I can be eaten.
🥪 You can make a sandwich with me.

food.question: I am a yummy snack. I'm made from milk, sugar, and frozen cold. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am a dessert.
🥶 I keep you cool on a hot day.
🍧 I come in many flavors and can be eaten in a cone.

food.question: I am yellow and white. You crack me open to cook me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥚 I come from a chicken.
🍳 You can fry me or scramble me.
🎂 People use me to make cakes

transport.question: I go beep beep! I have four wheels. What am I?

hints.text: 🚦 I stop at red lights.
👪 I can take you to see Grandma.
🔑 Mommy or Daddy drives me.

transport.question: I go choo choo! I ride on a track. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I am very long.
🎫 You need a ticket to ride me.
🎶 I make a loud noise when I move.

transport.question: I fly in the sky. I have wings. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I go way up high.
✈️ I can take you to far away places.
🌎 I am bigger than a bird.

transport.question: I float on the water. I can be big or small. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I don't fly or drive.
⚓ I might have a horn that goes 'toot toot!'
🐟 Fish swim beneath me.

transport.question: I am big and yellow. I take kids to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I have a special sign that pops out.
👦 Lots of children ride on me.
🚦 I stop at every stop sign.

transport.question: I have two wheels. You pedal me with your feet. What am I?

hints.text: 🚲 I need air in my tires.
🧑‍⚕️ You should wear a helmet when riding me.
👧 I can be big or small.

transport.question: I zoom really fast. I carry people into space. What am I?

hints.text: 👩‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
🔥 I have a big fiery engine.
🌙 I might go to the moon!

transport.question: I help people who are sick or hurt. I have a siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚑 I have a red cross on me.
🚨 My siren goes 'wee woo wee woo!'
🧑‍⚕️ Doctors and nurses sometimes ride in me.

transport.question: I can fly, but I don't have wings like a normal plane. I have spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one spot.
🚨 Sometimes the police use me.
🏢 I can land on top of buildings.

transport.question: I carry lots of cars across the water, so they don't have to drive all the way around. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I help cars travel on water
🚢 I am a type of boat.
🌊 I am bigger than a normal boat.
